column6: The Secret Wars sequel to the landmark inaugural X-Crossover continues! In desperate need of a cure for their people, Havok, Wolfsbane and the Press Gang have invaded X-City. As old friends become new enemies, the war to save Genosha from extinction is on!
column8: | artist:Carmine DiGiandomenico | writer:Marc Guggenheim | penciller (cover):David Nakayama
